medical_history.chief_complaint: Worsening right upper quadrant abdominal pain.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Pain started approximately a few weeks ago, but worsened yesterday. Symptoms are aggravated by deep breaths and walking, but improved when not moving.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Hyperparathyroidism, Gastroesophageal reflux disease (GERD), Helicobacter pylori infection.
